There has been lots of confusion on how to get
this game to work, so here some tips I've used
that worked for me and hope this may help you.

~ Unpack ~
Once you have downloaded ViTALiTY torrent you will see 68 vty-0129 files go to vty-0129.001 then right click and select Properties and click on Change and choose WinRAR archiver then press Ok.

~ Burn or mount ~
Open vty-0129.001 file using WinRAR and Extract vty-0129.iso file to desktop and mount the ISO file to your virtual image drive or copy it to DvD disk using Nero.

~ Install ~
Install the game as normal.

~ Use the keygen from the ViTALiTY folder ~
When it ask for the serial, use the keygen.

~ Copy the crack from the ViTALiTY folder ~
Now copy & paste \Base\TSBin\Sims2.exe patch in the same installed directory in C: drive of Sim 2 game folder and that also go for \EP2\TSBin\Sims2EP2.exe patch as well.

~ Rot in heaven! ~
That's all folks! and enjoy the game...

thx

The audio is not in English?  Actually it is "Simglish".  The Sims don't speak English no matter which option you choose to install it as.  And you probably wouldnt want to be able to understand them either since it would take away from the game to hear them say the same words over and over.  BTW, the currency is not in US dollars either, it is Simoleans.  LOL  

And /lol @ Aladin6, you sir are a true moron for calling Vitality "a bunch of assholes" for not making the download idiot-proof.  Wow.
